text: 10.42: Ru 22.25-26Mbe Zems gum Zon ga vhegim, Zisas mbaram mben kamgim, mbe ana han zim, ana mbe fugap, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde kaŋgi, harigi ŋgui gumgi, mbe won gumgi gu mbigi gari gumgir pani kav, mbe guigira wo gumgi gu mbigi gari. Mbe guigira mben piin kɨv, mbe zɨri ndiv vun kuamkuargane, mbe ne vuzvugi. Mben gumgi bakɨvi, khaŋ tɨgav havhargia mbe buni mbarara nta zɨn ŋgɨr zav mbe gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai.
